altername_name: Oui-Oui: Grande Fete au Pays des Jouets
name: Oui-Oui: Grande Fête au Pays des Jouets
overview: Oui-Oui: Grande Fête au Pays des Jouets is a collection of 15 different mini-games starring the character known in English as Noddy. The games audience is primarily aimed at young children from ages of 3 to 7. Games include things such as solving simple math equations, word search puzzles, Hangman, and Snake. The game offers 3 levels of difficulty to choose from.
